abstract: Children’s Aid Society, one of the seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Henry Casila of Washington Heights in Manhattan buy clothing and food for himself and his sons.
lead_paragraph: Henry Casilla recently moved to the United States with his two sons but not with his wife and daughter. He has struggled to adapt and had his sons briefly taken from him by a New York City agency.

headline.main: Immigrant Father Hopes to Improve From His Mistakes
headline.print_headline: A Father Hopes to Improve From His Mistakes

snippet: Henry Casilla recently moved to the United States with his two sons but not with his wife and daughter. He has struggled to adapt and had his sons briefly taken from him by a New York City agency.
